successes.title: Bublcam: 360º Camera Technology for Everyone
successes.description: The bublcam is a 360º camera and software technology that shares everything around you through spherical photos and videos.

Pledges.description: Pledge $449 CDN / *$429 USD - Limited Reward (250)Thanks for the kickstart. Grab your own jet black bublcam. Each one comes with an 8GB Micro SD card,camera pouch and lens cloth. You’ll also receive exclusive backer updates.

Pledge $499 CDN / *$476 USD - Limited Reward (250) THE BLACK & WHITE BALL. Because of the overwhelming demand you can now choose either a black or a white bublcam. This pledge includes all the perks including a mini tripod, camera pouch and lens cloth. Included also is the limited edition "exploded bublcam" t-shirt. This pledge level will also be able to apply for advanced access to the Bubl SDK and get the latest news exclusive backer updates.

Pledge $549 CDN / *$524 USD - UNLIMITEDGet a Bublcam in your favorite color; silver, blue, red, yellow, white, or black. It also includes an 8GB Micro SD card, a mini tripod, camera pouch and lens cloth. Included is the limited edition "exploded bublcam" t-shirt. These colours will first be available to Kickstarter backers. This pledge level will now also be able to apply for advanced access to the Bubl SDK and you’ll also receive exclusive backer updates.

Join us as we begin to develop the bubl ecosystem. Multiple cameras capturing content at the same time. Help us produce experiences that redefine virtual reality. Even create environments where we can learn to travel from one bubl to another. Get 2 bublcams in your favourite colour; silver, blue, red, yellow, white or black. Get access to the bubl SDK. Included are 2 8GB Micro SD cards, 2 mini tripods, 2 camera pouches and 2 lens cloths. You'll also get a limited edition "exploded bublcam" t-shirt. Save more than $400 off of the retail price and get the latest news exclusive backer updates.
Estimated delivery: May 2014Add $50 CAD to ship to and outside of Canada*USD exchange rate is an estimation only

For an $8,000 pledge we'll fly you to the bubl headquarters in Toronto to meet the founders, hang out with team and see how bubl is planning to advance technology for everyone. You’ll be our special guest at our private bubl launch party. Then go home with your very own gold finished special edition bublcam with all the accessories and an "exploded bublcam" t-shirt signed by the bubl team.
HIGH FIVE! Thank you for believing in bubl. Pledge $5 and we’ll provide you with exclusive updates on the progress of the bublcam and our software technology evolution.

THE EXPLODED BUBLCAM T-SHIRT 
Grab a limited edition bubl t-shirt. Kickstarter backers get it first. You’ll also receive exclusive backer updates.
